content: Why is he banned on twitter?

comments.author: DaveF
comments.body: It's not the 1st time he has gotten suspended.He is (was) VERY abrasive there to people who did not share his religious beliefs. So he probably crossed the line again and got the boot.Not that is matters much, the way Twitter is loosing users at the moment as people flee to other platforms fewer and fewer people will care when users get suspended.-Dave

comments.author: dragonvslinux
comments.body: Quote from: hsdjkahskjdh on April 24, 2023, 01:13:53 PMWhy is he banned on twitter?There's been a lot relatively random banning's on Twitter since the takeover. Initially a lot of users unbanned, but since then a significant amount banned. In reality the censorship remains relatively high, just significantly different. Rather than censorship targeting far-right it has targeted far-left, as well other new reasons such as sharing live location data of others without consent (doxxing), hacked materials, etc.If I had to guess it wouldn't be due to his religious believes, as these are generally well tolerated on twitter. Maybe worth pointing out he had an account on a mastodon instance called "Bitcoin Hackers" (now closed). So if he shared any hacked materials from there on twitter then that would be an account suspension. That's speculation I know, but other users have been banned recently for sharing hacked materials.He's on Nostr I believe, so if you wanted to find out the reason for his suspension you might find it from him there.
